features: 【Boucle Fabric】 Soft boucle fabric with natural solid color.
【Size】 20x20 Inch / 50x50cm TWO pillow covers. COVERS ONLY, pillows are not included. Please allow 0.5-1 inch deviation because of hand-made and sewing.
【Hidden Zipper】 High-quality and smooth invisible zipper perfectly matches the color of the pillowcase.

【Application】 With its soft textured hand-feel, available in a range of calming neutrals, brings a divine level of coziness to your home decorative, living rooms, bedding, kitchen, car, patio, toss, outdoor chair, bedrooms, offices, etc. Suitable for Spring Home Decor.
【Care Guide】 Please use hand wash or gentle machine wash; dry clean recommended. Do not bleach.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MIULEE Pack of 2 Decorative Boucle Couch Pillow Covers Made of soft boucle fabric with natural solid color. High-quality and smooth invisible zipper perfectly matche the color of the pillowcase. With its soft textured hand-feel, available in a range of calming neutrals, brings a divine level of coziness to your home decorative, living rooms, bedding, kitchen, car, patio, toss, outdoor chair, bedrooms, offices, etc. Suitable for Spring Home Decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not quite as soft as I hoped, but very nice quality
reviews.reviewText: I got this set of Miulee olive green pillow covers because I knew they would look great with my leather sofa and I felt like the product photos were really sharp and I could imagine what they would look and feel like in person. I can confirm this is very much the case. The color and texture are very true to the photos. The phrasing makes them sound like they'd be a bit softer and more plush, but they are still a comfortable fabric. The texture adds a coziness to the look and I really like these overall.Regarding quality, these seem really well made. The zippers do, in fact, match the fabric very well and are sewn in a way where they tuck into the seam and make them nearly invisible. The fabric feels very durable and the seams look to be nice and strong. I washed these before use and they seem like they'll hold up to long term use and occasional washing with no problem at all.Overall I think these are a good value and quality for the money. I am happy I got these and am sure these will be in my rotation for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Boucle Fabric Pillow Cases (2)
reviews.reviewText: MIULEE Set (2) Light Beige Throw Pillow Covers that are 20” x 20” made of polyester. I measured 19” x 19” end to end), but the website does mention a .5 to 1 inch deviation due to being hand-made. Website states that they are hand-made with invisible zippers. Material is a heavier quality and the light beige is a nice shade. Zippers are well-hidden. Dry clean recommended, but can be washed on gentle or hand washed. Would not use dryer so they don’t shrink.PRO: Boucle Pillow Cases (2), light beige, heavy duty material, feels quality, invisible zipper.CON: Pillows are an inch too short (measured 19” x 19” end to end), but the website does mention a .5 to 1 inch deviation due to being hand-made and the sewing. Zipper got stuck - it eventually worked, but took a few minutes of pulling and worrying I was going to rip the case, not very soft. Dry clean recommended, but can wash on gentle or hand wash. Would not use dryer so they don’t shrink.Packaging: Yes, IntactEase of Opening Package: Yes: Easy to openAssembly: Just inserting pillows.Recommend to a Friend: YesAge Appropriate: AdultsAppropriate for Price Point: Yes, High end price point range.Safety of Item: Per Website-Manufacturer: MIULEE/ This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications.Recycled materials: Contains at least 50% recycled material.As certified by Global Recycled Standard Global: Recycled StandardBatteries: NoneQuality Materials: As stated above under (SEE Safety of Item) Durable, Sturdy, Manufacturer: MIULEE/PolyesterRating: 4 STAR RatingSuggestions for Manufacturer: NoneYou should not rely solely on this content. This is just my opinion> I assume no liability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the texture
reviews.reviewText: These boucle pillows were a nice find. You can’t go wrong with a texture that works with so many other fabrics. The fabric is pretty soft for a polyester. I ordered the beige and it’s exactly what I expected. The hidden zipper works great which can be an issue with some pillows with thicker material. I’m pretty happy with them and think that they are a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect look!
reviews.reviewText: These boucle covers pulled together my look just perfectly! I actually mistakingly ordered the wrong color, ordering khaki instead of an off white/cream color, but that mistake worked out perfectly. I have a charcoal colored couch, with some black and white woven covers, along with some rust colored pillows, and the khaki pulled the looked together flawlessly! They are a thick material, and very soft to the touch. The zipper and all the seams are durable, and it brought the perfect look I was going for! In love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These throwpillow are the best Ive had so far. I like the fabric and the texture. They dont look like something cheaply made. I personally dont like something that is super soft so these are perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Fit, Good Fabric
reviews.reviewText: The old pillow covers we had were too small for the 12x20 pillows we have (we called them the sausage pillows because they were stuffed in there so tight). These are a much better fit--neither tight nor loose. The fabric is surprisingly soft but still heavy enough to feel substantial. The color of the Light Brown is hideous in person (only my opinion, especially as for how it goes with my decor), but it is what I ordered and I think that is really the only complaint I have about them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love these pillows! The size is has advertised, I love the texture to provide some depth to my couch, the color is as described as well. And, as you can see, my dogs find them very comfortable too! I had old pillows which did not have removable covers but were starting to get old and torn up, so this cover was a perfect solution. I am very happy with them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these pillow cases
reviews.reviewText: These pillow cases look so great! The texture of the material is plush but has a texture to it making it feel very high end and of good quality. The color is great, being a rich green color. The size was perfect for my standard size pillows. Easy to put on, and easy to keep in place with a zipper that is designed so that it is almost hidden. Love these pillow cases!
